name: Roo.dd.ScrollManager
desc:
Provides automatic scrolling of overflow regions in the page during drag operations.

Note: This class uses "Point Mode" and is untested in "Intersect Mode".

methods.name: register
methods.desc: Registers new overflow element(s) to auto scroll

params.name: el
params.desc: The id of or the element to be scrolled or an array of either

methods.name: unregister
methods.desc: Unregisters overflow element(s) so they are no longer scrolled

params.name: el
params.desc: The id of or the element to be removed or an array of either
